name: MTLIndirectCommandBuffer
desc: A command buffer containing reusable commands, encoded either on the CPU or GPU.

items.name: var size: Int
items.desc: The number of commands contained in the indirect command buffer.

items.name: func indirectRenderCommandAt(Int) -> MTLIndirectRenderCommand
items.desc: Gets the render command at the given index.

items.name: func indirectComputeCommandAt(Int) -> MTLIndirectComputeCommand
items.desc: Gets the compute command at the given index.

items.name: func reset(Range<Int>)
items.desc: Resets a range of commands to their default state.
